Would you like to view the tutorial?
Input game data using this button
View your group\'s statistics, as well as average statistics for the whole community, using this button
Use this button to edit previously entered games to amend any mistakes made. You can also remove games from the play history entirely
Use this button to customise your app experience. \nThis allows you to choose many things, including online capabilities and app appearance.
Use this button to report any issues you have, or bugs you find. As well as this, new suggestions can be made. \nIf you would like to translate the app, any offers are greatly appreciated.
Use this line to input your group\'s unique id, or create a new one. \nThis will be used to allow for different devices to sync the same games, and is required even if you remain offline
This switch controls whether or not your group data will be stored online. \nIt is still important to set your group id, as changing it will reset your recorded games, even when offline
Select which editions of the game you want to use cards from, and if alt art cards have a chance to be shown.
Use this to select the background of the app
Use this to select the border of the app
Use more readable fonts, rather than the Four Souls fonts
Use the clear button to remove all saved data on this device. Any games not saved online will be lost forever
Use this button to select which icons can be shown to shuffle a random selection of characters
Use these switches to define the behaviour of the randomisation of characters.
Characters can be prevented from duplicating, with Eden being a special case, and eternal items can be automatically selected for Eden.
Exiting will reset any changes made.\nDo you want to continue?
Input incorrect. Make sure all data is filled in correctly
Deleting a game is permanent and cannot be undone\nAre you sure you want to delete this game?

The preferred method of receiving feedback is via GitHub, so please use that where possible. Otherwise, links are provided to send emails.\nTranslation offers are appreciated, and should be sent via email.
Thanks to Éri Patrik for the suggestion of individual character randomisation and suggesting that total win count & soul count be shown in group statistics

Version 4.01 (17-Dec-21)



\u2022 Added new version recaps to the app so that changes are more visible

\u2022 Updated the blank character cards to use the new version 2 cards from u/Koretex_

\u2022 The Lost now automatically starts with 1 soul on the results screen

\u2022 Changed the list of sliders into a set of icons for each of the sets

\u2022 Separated out the shop promo cards from the gish, target and tapeworm promos for clarity

\u2022 Added a new randomise button in the character entry page to select characters randomly for you

\u2022 Added new settings to select which icons appear as the randomise button

\u2022 Added new settings to prevent the duplication of characters, and to randomly select an eternal item for any random eden selections

\u2022 Fixed a bug where the online id checking was not informing you of a group ID being in use

Version 4.02 (28-Jan-22)



\u2022 Added the clicker to the list of icons for the randomise button

\u2022 Added updated cards for Jacob \& Esau, The Baleful, Baba and Steven

\u2022 Added a privacy policy to be in line with google"s new policies

\u2022 Stopped patch notes from showing on first install of the app

Version 4.03 (16-Jun-22)



\u2022 Added cards from the Unboxing of Isaac, and associated Promos

\u2022 Added new Eden promo from UKGE

\u2022 Added Retro Eden, and a new pixel font which can be turned off

\u2022 Fixed a bug where reroll icons could be replaced by random images

Version 4.04 (11-Jul-22)



\u2022 Actually added cards from the Unboxing of Isaac, and associated Promos

\u2022 Added sync for promo and Unboxing of Isaac treasures so each new update doesn\'t require an update to the app

Version 4.05 (12-Apr-23)



\u2022 Separated G-Fuel cards from Promo cards, to be in line with foursouls.com

\u2022 Added new character alt art cards from The Unboxing of Isaac as options for character art

\u2022 Fixed font size issues when using the Retro Eden card

\u2022 Added a button to view all old patch notes from the settings menu, and added dates to the patch notes

Version 5.01 (18-May-23)



\u2022 Added the ability to save single player, and co-op games

\u2022 Stopped single player and co-op games from being shown in online statistics. They will have their own sections eventually, but it was important to get this out quickly

\u2022 Fixed a bug where any alternative art would show when editing old games

\u2022 Made it so characters from unselected expansions don\'t appear as blank cards when editing old games

Version 5.02 (8-Jul-23)



\u2022 Added the statistics sections for single player / co-op games

\u2022 Made the statistics menu smarter when showing options

\u2022 Adjusted some tutorial text to reflect the new function

Version 5.03 (10-Dec-23)



\u2022 Fixed a bug in the tutorial where the button to advance was off screen

\u2022 Forced the tutorial to move forward automatically after 10 seconds to prevent people getting stuck on it

\u2022 Added the new promo Bum-bo character art to the app

\u2022 Fixed a bug where patch notes would overlap the title on smaller devices

\u2022 Added a Spanish app translation using Google translate - please let me kow if this is unreadable

Version 5.04 (4-Jan-24)



\u2022 Added the ability to change langauge within the app, instead of using system language

\u2022 Added a French app translation using Google translate

\u2022 Added a German app translation using Google translate

\u2022 Added an Italian app translation using Google translate

\u2022 Apologies for all native speakers as these are rough translations - they may be entirely unusable

\u2022 If you wish to provide feedback or a better translation, please email using the "Offer to Translate" button.

Version 5.05 (24-Jun-24)



\u2022 Added new Bumbo alt art card from The Legend of Bumbo as an option for character art

\u2022 Added new Guppy alt art card from Youtooz as an option for character art

\u2022 Added characters and items from the new Summer of Isaac set

Version 5.06 (10-Aug-24)



\u2022 Added new "The Hoarder" alt art card from the Summer of Isaac set as an option for character art

\u2022 Added new "The Miser" alt art card from the Summer of Isaac set as an option for character art

\u2022 Reworked the tutorial to allow language to be selected before the main tutorial starts

Version 6.01 (07-Sept-24)



\u2022 Added new promotional Sony-Shock Eden alt art card as an option for character art

\u2022 Added the ability to reorder the game history from oldest first to newest first to make editing easier

\u2022 Added additional statistics options to the statistics table page (suggested by Éri Patrik)

\u2022 Added the ability to randomise individual characters on the character select screen (suggested by Éri Patrik)
